顏值.definition: attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)

顏厚有忸怩.definition: even the most brazen person will sometimes feel shame (idiom)

顏回.definition: Yan Hui (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius, also known as Yan Yuan 顏淵|颜渊[Yan2 Yuan1]

顏控.definition: someone who attaches great importance to good looks (esp. in others)

顏淵.definition: Yan Yuan (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3], also known as 顏回|颜回[Yan2 Hui2]

顏真卿.definition: Yan Zhenqing (709-785), a leading calligrapher of the Tang Dynasty

顏色.definition: color; countenance; appearance; facial expression; pigment; dyestuff

顏藝.definition: (ACG) art of making humorously exaggerated facial expressions (loanword from Japanese 顔芸 "kaogei")

顏面掃地.definition: lit. for one's face to reach rock bottom; to be thoroughly discredited (idiom)
